name: Hey, Wake Up!!!
description:
Hey, Wake Up!!!

It’s a story about escaping the dream.

High Concept: A kid wakes up in a fantasy toy factory and realizes that it is not reality. It’s a story about escaping his dream. He is forced to run and find a way to wake up.  

Description: The objective of this prototype is to show my ability to design, prototype and playtest original video game gameplay. The focus is on creating a challenging single-player experience with an interesting dramatic arc and enjoyable game-feel.

For design document and playtesting report, please visit: http://learnwithjoe.blogspot.com.au/2017/02/hey-wake-up-pc-2017.html
